item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI o1 system card (243 points | 131 comments)
2. ChatGPT Pro (247 points | 436 comments)
3. 7 Databases in 7 Weeks for 2025 (174 points | 51 comments)
4. PaliGemma 2: Powerful Vision-Language Models, Simple Fine-Tuning (88 points | 10 comments)
5. Show HN: Banan-OS, an Unix-like operating system written from scratch (91 points | 12 comments)
6. Zep AI (YC W24) Is Hiring a Dev Advocate ( | hide)
7. Chocolate intake and risk of type 2 diabetes: prospective cohort studies (36 points | 36 comments)
8. AmpereOne: Cores Are the New MHz (54 points | 28 comments)
9. An Interview with Bill Watterson (1987) (84 points | 52 comments)
10. McKinsey unit will pay $123M to settle claims it bribed South African officials (29 points | 7 comments)
11. Tsunami Warning for Northern California (239 points | 139 comments)
12. Congo gov. says it's 'on alert' over mystery flu-like disease that killed dozens (43 points | 12 comments)
13. Accidentally writing a fast SAT solver (5 points | discuss)
14. Haunted by My Own Projects (25 points | 9 comments)
15. Exploring inference memory saturation effect: H100 vs. MI300x (42 points | 7 comments)
16. Diátaxis – A systematic approach to technical documentation authoring (433 points | 107 comments)
17. Show HN: Replace "hub" by "ingest" in GitHub URLs for a prompt-friendly extract (127 points | 32 comments)
18. I Spent a Year Building an Android Course for the Elderly–Here's What I Learned (10 points | 2 comments)
19. cli53 – Command line tool for Amazon Route 53 (35 points | 5 comments)
20. Boeing Plea Deal over Fatal 737 MAX Crashes Rejected by Judge (97 points | 69 comments)
21. Training myself to run farther with Strava's API and an IoT dog feeder of M&Ms (104 points | 41 comments)
22. FreeBSD OCI Container on Jails/Bhyve with Support for Podman (27 points | 5 comments)
23. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (58 points | 42 comments)
24. Genie 2: A large-scale foundation world model (1181 points | 390 comments)
25. Atmospheric analysis shows Venus never had Earth-like life, scientists say (31 points | 3 comments)
26. Federal Court Says Dismantling a Phone to Install Firmware Isn't a 'Search' (212 points | 101 comments)
27. Memory is all we have (4 points | discuss)
28. They don't make them like that any more: the Yamaha DX7 keyboard (300 points | 192 comments)
29. Why did clothing become boring? (67 points | 83 comments)
30. Sitters and Standers (399 points | 216 comments)
